articles.author: Diego Mendoza
articles.title: CDC warns of deadly MPox variant amid fears virus will spread - Semafor
articles.description: An outbreak of mpox in Africa has health officials sounding the alarm for the public to get vaccinated before the disease spreads to North America.
articles.content: US health authorities warned Thursday that a deadlier version of mpox (formerly monkeypox) spreading in the Democratic Republic of the Congo could soon cross international borders, urging those at ri… [+523 chars]
